title: Why dont Illaois skills cost mana?
body: I get shes supposed to be a champion that deters people from fighting her in her point of power, and shes very good at it, but why don't her skills actually cost her any meaningful amount??? i fought her as tryndamere and she cast minimum 5 rotations of her skills with no regeneration and she lost make 70% of her mana. Was this some design oversight???

replies.body:
Bruiser generally have low mana costs unless its a poke spell/high impact spell, those cost generally more.

Its because Bruiser rarely get any mana items at all so their spells cant cost that much because of that.

Illaoi for example doesnt get any mana item (outside of maybe Triforce?) as far as I know.

lol if you can't beat illaoi as tryndamere then you are doing something seriously wrong.

He straight up hard counters her.

Wins level 1 and 2 hard as fuck.

Level 3-5 farm as normal and if she throws e dodge and fuck her up.

Level 6+ congrats she should never be able to kill you again.   You should always be able to live through her damage with ulti and if you have been winning lane/stayed even then you should easily have enough damage to kill her every time your utli is up.
